verses.verse: All the commandment <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117> shall ye observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213>, that ye may live <WH2421>, and multiply <WH7235>, and go in <WH935> and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto your fathers <WH1>.

And thou shalt remember <WH2142> all the way <WH1870> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath led <WH3212> thee these forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness <WH4057>, that he might humble <WH6031> thee <WH5254>, to prove thee <WH3045>, to know what was in thy heart <WH3824>, whether thou wouldest keep <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687>, or not.

And he humbled <WH6031> thee <WH7456>, and suffered thee to hunger, and fed <WH398> thee with manna <WH4478>, which thou knewest <WH3045> not <WH1>, neither did thy fathers know <WH3045>; that he might make thee know <WH3045> that man <WH120> doth not live <WH2421> by bread <WH3899> only <WH905>, but by everything that proceedeth <WH4161> out of the mouth <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068> doth man <WH120> live <WH2421>.
Thy raiment <WH8071> waxed not old <WH1086> upon thee <WH7272>, neither did thy foot swell <WH1216>, these forty <WH705> years <WH8141>.
And thou shalt consider <WH3045> in <WH5973> thy heart <WH3824>, that <WH376>, as a man chasteneth <WH3256> his son <WH1121>, so Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> chasteneth thee <WH3256>.
And thou shalt keep <WH8104> the commandments <WH4687> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> in his ways <WH1870>, and to fear him <WH3372>.

For Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> bringeth <WH935> thee into a good <WH2896> land <WH776>, a land <WH776> of brooks <WH5158> of water <WH4325>, of fountains <WH5869> and springs <WH8415>, flowing forth <WH3318> in valleys <WH1237> and hills <WH2022>;
a land <WH776> of wheat <WH2406> and barley <WH8184>, and vines <WH1612> and fig-trees <WH8384> and pomegranates <WH7416>; a land <WH776> of olive <WH2132> - trees <WH8081> and honey <WH1706>;

a land <WH776> wherein <WH834> thou shalt eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> without <WH3808> scarceness <WH4544>, thou shalt not lack <WH2637> anything in it <WH776>; a land whose stones <WH68> are iron <WH1270>, and out of whose hills <WH2042> thou mayest dig <WH2672> copper <WH5178>.
And thou shalt eat <WH398> and be full <WH7646>, and thou shalt bless <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> for the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which he hath given thee <WH5414>.

Beware <WH8104> lest thou forget <WH7911> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, in not keeping <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687>, and his ordinances <WH4941>, and his statutes <WH2708>, which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>:
lest <WH398>, when thou hast eaten and art full <WH7646>, and hast built <WH1129> goodly <WH2896> houses <WH1004>, and dwelt therein <WH3427>;
and when thy herds <WH1241> and thy flocks <WH6629> multiply <WH7235>, and thy silver <WH3701> and thy gold <WH2091> is multiplied <WH7235>, and all that thou hast is multiplied <WH7235>;

then thy heart <WH3824> be lifted up <WH7311>, and thou forget <WH7911> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, who brought thee forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, out of the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>;

who led <WH3212> thee through the great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> wilderness <WH4057>, wherein were fiery <WH8314> serpents <WH5175> and scorpions <WH6137>, and thirsty <WH6774> ground where was no water <WH4325>; who brought thee forth <WH3318> water <WH4325> out of the rock <WH6697> of flint <WH2496>;

who fed <WH398> thee in the wilderness <WH4057> with manna <WH4478>, which thy fathers <WH1> knew <WH3045> not <WH6031>; that he might humble thee <WH5254>, and that he might prove thee <WH3190>, to do thee good at thy latter end <WH319>:
and lest thou say <WH559> in thy heart <WH3824>, My power <WH3581> and the might <WH6108> of my hand <WH3027> hath gotten <WH6213> me this wealth <WH2428>.

But thou shalt remember <WH2142> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, for it is he that giveth <WH5414> thee power <WH3581> to get <WH6213> wealth <WH2428>; that he may establish <WH6965> his covenant <WH1285> which he sware <WH7650> unto thy fathers <WH1>, as at this day <WH3117>.

And it shall be <WH7911>, if thou shalt forget <WH7911> Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and walk <WH1980> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and serve <WH5647> them <WH7812>, and worship them <WH5749>, I testify against you this day <WH3117> that ye shall surely <WH6> perish <WH6>.

As the nations <WH1471> that Jehovah <WH3068> maketh to perish <WH6> before you <WH6440>, so shall ye perish <WH6>; because <WH6118> ye would not hearken <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>.
